thread.title: Slync Appoints Supply Chain Veteran Thomas Wrobleski to Board of Directors

author: cnbc.com
title: Slync Appoints Supply Chain Veteran Thomas Wrobleski to Board of Directors
text:
International supply chain expert to help integrate blockchain technology into global logistics networks
SAN FRANCISCO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Slync , the enterprise blockchain platform for the shipping, logistics and supply chain industries, has added international supply chain expert Thomas Wrobleski to its board of directors. Wrobleski, formally the Executive Vice President of Global Strategic Accounts at Chainalytics, brings extensive supply chain and large-scale business transformation experience to the Slync team.
“The incredible complexity inherent in today’s international shipping industry makes the market ripe for disruption,” said Wrobleski. “Blockchain promises to transform many of the industry’s most inefficient and complex practices, and Slync is well-positioned to take advantage by making business easier, more efficient and affordable for trading partners across the globe.”
Wrobleski is known for his consulting services across the entire value chain, with a strong focus on applying Lean practices. Currently serving as a senior client partner leading global marquee accounts at Korn Ferry, Wrobleski’s previous experience includes senior roles at Capgemini Consulting, A.T. Kearney, Alix Partners and Bearing Point. Wrobleski has led numerous, large-scale transformation projects for Fortune 500 big-box retailers, CPG manufacturers and distributors throughout his career.
“Tom’s vast supply chain expertise and cross-functional global business experience will be a valuable asset to me and to Slync as we continue to grow. Tom has already been instrumental in our progress and we are lucky to have him involved,” said Chris Kirchner, CEO and co-founder of Slync.
For more information on how Slync is transforming how supply chain partners interact and collaborate with blockchain, visit Slync.io .
About Slync
Founded in 2017, Slync is an intelligent, blockchain-based platform revolutionizing the ways partners exchange value in the supply chain. Slync currently offers three end-to-end applications, including Slync Logistics, Slync Traceability and Slync Compliance. Additionally, the Slync platform provides customers the ability to create customized application solutions leveraging blockchain technology for their business. Slync empowers customers to collaborate in a completely trusted and secure manner using blockchain, resulting in dramatic cost savings through new operational efficiencies. Learn more at www.slync.io and on Twitter and LinkedIn .
